summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json, which appears to be a planning/tracking file that records feature requests as 'pending'. None of the actual frontend implementation files (components, pages, services, utilities) have been added or modified. All six requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-6) are listed as pending feature requests in the project state file but have not been implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Personalized Recommendations Feed page or section that analyzes bookmarked and recently viewed repositories to surface similar repos.
missing_requirements.reason: Only recorded as a pending entry in project_state.json. No frontend component, page, or service files were added or modified to implement this feature.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Project Roadmap Extractor feature on the repository detail page using GitHub API data (issues, milestones, labels, file structure).
missing_requirements.reason: Only recorded as a pending entry in project_state.json. No frontend component or service files were added or modified to implement this feature.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a One-Click README Generator on the repository detail page producing a professional README.md using rule-based logic.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Termux Integration panel on the repository detail page that generates ready-to-copy Termux shell commands using GitHub CLI.
